records.question: What is the return policy?
records.answer: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase with original receipt. Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.

records.question: Do you ship internationally?
records.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days and costs vary by destination. Please note that customs fees may apply.

records.question: What payment methods do you accept?
records.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment system.

records.question: What warranty do you provide?
records.answer: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Extended warranty options are available for purchase. Warranty covers manufacturing defects but not physical damage.

records.question: What are the dimensions of the Wireless Bluetooth Headphones?
records.answer: The Wireless Bluetooth Headphones (PRD001) measure 7.5 x 6.5 x 3 inches and weigh 0.8 lbs. They feature 40mm drivers and 20-hour battery life.

records.question: Is the Smartphone Case compatible with all phone models?
records.answer: The Smartphone Case (PRD002) is available in multiple sizes for iPhone and Samsung models. Please check the compatibility chart before ordering.

records.question: How do I connect the Wireless Mouse?
records.answer: The Wireless Mouse (PRD005) connects via USB receiver. Insert the receiver into your computer's USB port, turn on the mouse, and it will connect automatically.

records.question: How long does the Power Bank take to charge?
records.answer: The Power Bank (PRD006) takes 4-6 hours to fully charge using the included USB-C cable. LED indicators show charging progress.

records.question: How do I track my order?
records.answer: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email. Visit our website and enter your order number and email address in the tracking section.

records.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
records.answer: Shipping address can only be changed within 2 hours of placing the order. Contact customer support immediately if you need to make changes.
